title: Architectural Heritage Management
description:
This module will introduce students to the history and concept of cultural heritage, fundamental heritage conservation approaches and their underlying ethics and
philosophies. This module will provide the students with an understanding of the idea of “heritage,” and multiplicity of meanings, values and priorities attributed to heritage; interpretation and politics of representation and the role of community in it; and the current debates and potential futures of architectural heritage planning and management in Singapore and the region.
